children.text: The solar hot water service pipes have not been fully insulated in all areas, which will be reducing the efficiency of the system.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 3500.4 Plumbing and Drainage, requires that
pipes between the collectors and storage container to be insulated to a minimum R value of 0.3. This is equivalent to 13mm wall thickness closed cell polymer insulation’ .
There should be insulation installed to all solar HWS piping in accordance with Australian Standards.
